mapper.select: SELECT USER.USER_EMAIL, USER.USER_NICKNAME, REGISTER_TYPE.USER_NUM, REGISTER_TYPE.REGISTER_TYPE_CODE FROM REGISTER_TYPE JOIN USER ON REGISTER_TYPE.USER_NUM = USER.USER_NUM WHERE REGISTER_TYPE_CODE = 'D';

SELECT USER.USER_NICKNAME, CATEGORY, DEALER_PAGE_NUM FROM DEALER_PAGE JOIN USER ON USER.USER_NUM = DEALER_PAGE.USER_NUM
WHERE DEALER_PAGE_NUM = #{dealer_page_num};
SELECT LIKE_COUNT - DISLIKE_COUNT FROM DEALER_PAGE WHERE DEALER_PAGE_NUM = #{dealer_page_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE DEALER_PAGE SET LIKE_COUNT = LIKE_COUNT + 10 WHERE DEALER_PAGE_NUM = #{dealerNum}
UPDATE DEALER_PAGE SET DISLIKE_COUNT = DISLIKE_COUNT + 10 WHERE DEALER_PAGE_NUM = #{dealerNum}
